mapper.sql: button_id AS "buttonId", menu_id AS "menuId", resource_id AS "resourceId", button_name AS "buttonName", button_code AS "buttonCode", description AS "description", status AS "status", order_no AS "orderNo", create_user AS "createUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_user AS "updateUser", update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.select:
SELECT b.button_id AS buttonId, b.button_name AS buttonName, b.button_code AS buttonCode, b.`status` AS status, r.resource_id AS resourceId, r.class_name AS controllerName, r.`name` AS resourceName FROM biemo_sys_button b INNER JOIN biemo_sys_resource r ON b.res_code = r.code
and b.menu_id = #{menuId}
and b.button_name like concat('%',#{buttonName},'%')
and b.button_code like concat('%',#{buttonCode},'%')
order by b.order_no asc,b.create_time desc
SELECT b.res_code FROM biemo_sys_button b LEFT JOIN biemo_sys_menu m ON b.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE m.app_id = #{appId}
SELECT modular_name AS modularName, modular_code AS modularCode FROM biemo_sys_resource WHERE menu_flag = 'N' AND app_code = #{appCode} GROUP BY modular_code
SELECT `name` AS resName, `code` AS resCode FROM biemo_sys_resource WHERE modular_code = #{modularCode}
